UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Tribolium castaneum defensins are primarily active against Gram-positive bacteria.
Literature.Author: Tonk M, Knorr E, Cabezas-Cruz A, Valdés JJ, Kollewe C, Vilcinskas A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus DSM 20030(MIC=0.032µM),Bacillus thuringiensis serovar tenebrionis(no activity data),Bacillus thuringiensis serovar kumamtoensis(no activity data),Bacillus thuringiensis serovar tolworthi(MIC=7µM),Staphylococcus aureus DSM 20231(no activity data),Staphylococcus epidermidis DSM 20044(MIC=7µM),Escherichia coli 1103(no activity data),Pseudomonas entomophila CCUG 61470(no activity data),Saccharomyces cerevisiae YSC2(no activity data)
